node.display_long_description:
2MD is a groundbreaking motion-controlled VR football game. Draw the plays, call the shots, and throw, hand-off, or run the ball before the clock runs out!

‣ Throw like a pro with realistic motion controls in a room-scale quarterback experience.
‣ Draw plays and hone your strategy: customize up to 8 offensive plays in VR before taking the field.
‣ Featuring 8 unique teams. Customize colors, QB voice, route color, and more.
- Choose from two distinct player types - robots or tackle dummies!
‣ Includes 8 immersive stadiums filled with thousands of screaming fans.
‣ Featuring the voice talents of Xander Mobus, SungWon Cho, David Wald, and more.
‣ Exciting arcade presentation with a 7-round heat and rapid-fire bonus rounds.
‣ Spectacular replay-ability, challenging AI, achievements, leader-boards and a virtual trophy case.
‣ Oculus Rift Cross-Buy Enabled.

latest_supported_binary.change_log:
2MD: VR Football Unleashed ver 1.05 Patch Notes:
- Players can now select between DUMMY and ROBOT body types!
- Unique player helmet design based on body types selected.
- improved performance across Quest and Quest 2 platforms
- improved audio spacialization
- improved pickupable object highlighting

nodes.title: 2MD ver 1.05 Update | The Dummies Strike Back!
nodes.body_text:
The tackle dummies return to exact their softly-padded revenge upon the football field . . . if only it was that dramatic! But seriously, now players can swap between body types using the whiteboard prior to starting on the road to the championship.  And a few other small improvements here and there because, you know, who can resist endlessly tweaking something.

2MD: VR Football Unleashed ver 1.05 Patch Notes:
- Players can now select between DUMMY and ROBOT body types!
- Unique sound effects for each body type
- Unique player helmet design based on body types selected.
- improved performance across Quest and Quest 2 platforms
- improved audio spacialization and performance
- improved pickupable object highlighting

nodes.title: 2MD: VR Football Unleashed Robot Rampage Edition 1.04 Update - User feedback and more!
nodes.body_text:
2MD: VR Football Unleashed Robot Rampage Edition. - 1.04 Release Notes
- Updated player movement sounds to include more realistic footsteps for different surfaces (grass, metal)
- Updated player impacts to include traditional tackle sounds
- Further decreased prominence of spark sounds
- Minor texture improvements

node.reviewDescription: The game had gotten a lot more realistic this update than ever which makes things a lot more fun. What I wish what could happen is that there is a defensive side of the ball instead of just an offensive side of the ball, meaning that I want to play the defensive side of the ball too, and maybe add four quarters of like a minute each and make a choice of doing franchise or multiplayer. Please add these things on this game, thanks!
node.reviewTitle: Game is very good, but need some changes
